reviewText: If you want to shoot sporting clays it is a must. Part of me wants to keep it a secret
The person who wrote the poor review was reviewing their experience with the seller, not the DVD.  It is actually quite good, with excellent explanations by a great shooter of clays.

we ordered this specifically because it said "dvd".  we assumed it was a disc.  this is a vhs tape and cannot be used on a dvd player.  my husband is having to dig out an old vhs player and reconnect it to our tv.  be aware its a vhs tape.  we definitely would not have ordered if we had known this.
